trans-unit.source: Stride doesn't run
trans-unit.target: Stride doesn't run

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: If you're having trouble running Stride, make sure you've installed all the prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: If you're having trouble running Stride, make sure you've installed all the prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework 4.7.2
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.7.2

trans-unit.source: Visual C++ Redistributable 2019
trans-unit.target: Visual C++ Redistributable 2019

trans-unit.source: Build Tools for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Build Tools for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, uninstall Stride, restart the Stride installer, and install the prerequisites when prompted.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, uninstall Stride, restart the Stride installer, and install the prerequisites when prompted.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework 4.7.2
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.7.2

trans-unit.source: To check if this is installed, see Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features and look for an entry containing .NET 4.7.2.
trans-unit.target: To check if this is installed, see Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features and look for an entry containing .NET 4.7.2.

trans-unit.source: Programs and features
trans-unit.target: Programs and features

trans-unit.source: If it's not installed, you can download it from the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: If it's not installed, you can download it from the Microsoft Download Center.

trans-unit.source: !Note If you install Visual Studio, make sure you also install the .Net Framework support. Just the Visual Studio base installation isn't enough.
trans-unit.target: !Note If you install Visual Studio, make sure you also install the .Net Framework support. Just the Visual Studio base installation isn't enough.

trans-unit.source: Visual C++ Redistributable 2019
trans-unit.target: Visual C++ Redistributable 2019

trans-unit.source: To check if this is installed, see Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features and look for 2015-2019 Redistributable.
trans-unit.target: To check if this is installed, see Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features and look for 2015-2019 Redistributable.

trans-unit.source: Programs and features
trans-unit.target: Programs and features

trans-unit.source: If it's not installed, you can download the 2019 Redistributable from Visual Studio Downloads (under Other Tools and Frameworks).
trans-unit.target: If it's not installed, you can download the 2019 Redistributable from Visual Studio Downloads (under Other Tools and Frameworks).

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)

trans-unit.source: If you have Visual Studio 2019 installed, you need to have the following workloads and/or components installed:
trans-unit.target: If you have Visual Studio 2019 installed, you need to have the following workloads and/or components installed:

trans-unit.source: .NET core cross-platform development, with .NET Core 2.1 Runtime (LTS) optional component enabled.
trans-unit.target: .NET core cross-platform development, with .NET Core 2.1 Runtime (LTS) optional component enabled.

trans-unit.source: On top of that, if you still have Visual Studio 2017 installed, it should be version 15.9+.
trans-unit.target: On top of that, if you still have Visual Studio 2017 installed, it should be version 15.9+.

trans-unit.source: Build Tools for Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)
trans-unit.target: Build Tools for Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)

trans-unit.source: If you don't have Visual Studio installed and don't want to install it, you need to install Build Tools for Visual Studio. You can download this from Visual Studio Downloads (under Other Tools and Frameworks).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have Visual Studio installed and don't want to install it, you need to install Build Tools for Visual Studio. You can download this from Visual Studio Downloads (under Other Tools and Frameworks).

trans-unit.source: !Note Windows uses the Visual Studio installer to install the Visual C++ Redistributable and Build Tools for Visual Studio prerequisites. If you don't need Visual Studio, don't worry – it doesn't install it. Installing VS build tools
trans-unit.target: !Note Windows uses the Visual Studio installer to install the Visual C++ Redistributable and Build Tools for Visual Studio prerequisites. If you don't need Visual Studio, don't worry – it doesn't install it. Installing VS build tools

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 5.0 (only for .NET version)
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 5.0 (only for .NET version)

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 5.0 should have been installed by Stride prerequisite installer, if Visual Studio 2019 didn't do it previously.
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 5.0 should have been installed by Stride prerequisite installer, if Visual Studio 2019 didn't do it previously.

trans-unit.source: If for some reason you need to install it manually, you can use this link.
trans-unit.target: If for some reason you need to install it manually, you can use this link.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also
